name: Students' Relief Society
briefDescription: Students Relief Society was born with ideological commitment to do concrete work for betterment of society. It has kept its focus on deprived section of the society, especially on women issues. It has touched ecological issues on one side, whereas it has developed a strong belief in revival of traditional practices in health. The organization strives to•	foster sustainable development•	mitigate social and economic problems•	strengthen the bonds of community spirit•	work towards social justice •	promote peace and security
